metadata.title: Thursday, 13th February, 2025
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct local court buildings in the following areas in Lundazi District:
(i) Mwase Sub-Boma in Mwase Chiefdom; and (ii) Mphamba Chiefdom;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) why the construction of a hospital in Fisenge area in Luanshya Parliamentary Constituency has stalled;
(b) when the project will resume;
(c) what the cost of the project is;
(d) how much money had been paid to the contractor for the project, as of March, 2024; and
(e) when the project will be completed.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate the Mpika - Katibunga road in Mpika Parliamentary Constituency, which is in a deplorable state;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to reconstruct the Bulangililo Water Works Bridge across the Kafue River in Kwacha Parliamentary Constituency, which is in a deplorable state;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development why fourteen (14) employees of the Chienge Town Council were dismissed in February, 2024.

parts: (a) whether the funds for the construction of a secondary school, funded by the World Bank, in Musalango Ward in Chipili Parliamentary Constituency were released, as of March, 2024;
(b) if so, when the construction works will commence;
(c) what the cost of the project is; and
(d) if the funds were not released, why. ___________________________
